document.full_text: former egyptian president hosni mubarak and his family are not allowed to leave the country, the military council to which he handed power on february 11 said on monday.
document.title: army says mubarak, family forced to stay in egypt
lines_and_colors: former egyptian president hosni mubarak and his family are not allowed to leave the country, the military council to which he handed power on february 11 said on monday.
